meanings.definition: The quality or state of being selfless.
meanings.sent1: Her selflessnesses shone through when she donated all her birthday money to charity.
meanings.sent2: The community admired his selflessnesses in always helping those in need.
meanings.sent3: His selflessnesses in sharing his last cookie made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The selflessnesses of the firefighters rushing into the burning building was truly heroic.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's selflessnesses in staying late to help her students left a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: The act of putting others' needs before one's own.
meanings.sent1: In her selflessnesses, she gave up her seat on the bus to an elderly lady.
meanings.sent2: His selflessnesses were evident when he volunteered to work on weekends to help his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The dog showed selflessnesses by sharing its bone with the new puppy.
meanings.sent4: The selflessnesses of the nurse working long hours to care for patients was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The selflessnesses of the volunteers in the community made a real difference in people's lives.
